mapper.insert: insert into rc_order (ORDER_ID, BUYER_ID, CREATE_TIME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PAY_PRICE, BUYER_STATUS, SELLER_STATUS, MERCHANT_ID, DELIVERY_TYPE, PAYMENT_INTERFACE, PAYMENT_TYPE, PICKUP_CODE, SELLER_MEMO, BUYER_MEMO, VENDOR_ID, CITY_ID, TABLE_NUMBER, CUSTOMER_COUNT, EAT_TYPE, SECTION_NAME, TABLE_ID,SECTION_ID) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{productPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{buyerStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sellerStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{merchantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliveryType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paymentInterface,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paymentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pickupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellerMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vendorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tableNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{customerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eatType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sectionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{sectionId})
mapper.update:
update rc_order
BUYER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PRODUCT_PRICE = #{productPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAY_PRICE = #{payPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BUYER_STATUS = #{buyerStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SELLER_STATUS = #{sellerStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DELIVERY_TYPE = #{deliveryType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PAYMENT_INTERFACE = #{paymentInterface,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PAYMENT_TYPE = #{paymentType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PICKUP_CODE = #{pickupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELLER_MEMO = #{sellerMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUYER_MEMO = #{buyerMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VENDOR_ID = #{vendorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TABLE_NUMBER = #{tableNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CUSTOMER_COUNT = #{customerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EAT_TYPE = #{eatType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SECTION_NAME = #{sectionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SECTION_ID = #{sectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ORDER_ID, BUYER_ID, CREATE_TIME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PAY_PRICE, BUYER_STATUS, SELLER_STATUS, MERCHANT_ID, DELIVERY_TYPE, PAYMENT_INTERFACE, PAYMENT_TYPE, PICKUP_CODE, SELLER_MEMO, BUYER_MEMO, VENDOR_ID, CITY_ID, TABLE_NUMBER, CUSTOMER_COUNT, EAT_TYPE, SECTION_NAME, TABLE_ID,SECTION_ID from rc_order where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
